block.p: National League HOUSTON ASTROS--Recalled RHP Jose Cabrera from New Orleans of the PCL. BASKETBALL
National League HOUSTON ASTROS--Recalled RHP Jose Cabrera from New Orleans of the PCL. BASKETBALL

National Basketball Association LOS ANGELES CLIPPERS--Named Alvin Gentry coach. LOS ANGELES LAKERS--Signed Bill Sharman, special consultant, to a multiyear contract extension. MILWAUKEE BUCKS--Named Gerald Oliver special assignments coach. ORLANDO MAGIC--Signed G Troy Hudson. SACRAMENTO KINGS--Re-signed G Jon Barry to a multiyear contract. SAN ANTONIO SPURS--Signed F Danny Ferry. SEATTLE SUPERSONICS--Signed F Olumide Oyedeji to a two-year contract. UTAH JAZZ--Agreed to terms with G John Crotty.

National Footbal League DALLAS COWBOYS--Released RB Phillip Rogers. NEW ORLEANS SAINTS--Traded TE Lawrence Hart to the Dallas Cowboys for a future conditional draft choice. Signed TE Scott Slutzker. SAN FRANCISCO 49ERS--Promoted player personnel director Terry Donahue to assistant general manager. SEATTLE SEAHAWKS--Signed OL Jeff Dellenbach.
Xtreme Football League LAS VEGAS--Named Jim Criner coach, Bob Ackles general manager and Don Gregory player personnel director.

ISLANDERS--Named Kerry Gwydir publications coordinator, Kevin Schwab special events coordinator, Melissa Harding community relations coordinator and Rocky Bonanno communications assistant. OTTAWA SENATORS--Agreed to terms with D Jason York on a one-year contract. Signed F Derek King to a one-year contract. PITTSBURGH PENGUINS--Named Randy Hillier assistant coach. Re-signed F Dennis Bonvie to a one-year contract. SAN JOSE SHARKS--Re-signed RW Niklas Sundstrom and LW Jarrett Deuling. Signed D Steve Bancroft.

FAIRLEIGH DICKINSON--Named Don Hahn assistant baseball coach and field and events coordinator. IOWA STATE--Reinstated CB Jamarcus Powers to the football team. LOUISVILLE--Named Richard Ruggieri women's rowing team coach. MASSACHUSETTS-BOSTON--Announced it will not renew the contract of Kevin McGonagle, ice hockey coach. NEW HAMPSHIRE--Named Cory McClure men's assistant basketball coach. ST. FRANCIS, PA.--Named Dino Kalis, defensive line coach, Chris Elliott tight ends-halfbacks coach, and Matt Balsavage defensive backs coach.
